A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This is the worst movie in the franchise. Yes\, even worse than episodes I- II. Campy\, bad plotline\, character incongruency\, forced nostalgia- these are just some of the issues with the latest movie. Admittedly\, I loved Rogue One and didn't mind the Force Awakens and had assumed an upward trend in Star Wars. I was wrong. The last half hour was so comically bad and corny that I was audibly groaning in the movie theater. Something I've never done.
